name: Dozen Raw Oysters
description: Freshly shucked oysters served with cocktail sauce, tabasco, and lime wedges.

name: Half-Dozen Raw Oysters
description: Freshly shucked oysters served with cocktail sauce, tabasco, and lime wedges.

name: Fried Oysters
description: Cajun seasoning, served with cocktail sauce.

name: Kickin' Wings
description: (6 pieces) Crispy fried chicken wings coated with garlic butter and our dry Cajun rub.

name: Fish n' Fries
description: (5 pieces) Crispy battered white fish served with tartar sauce and Cajun fries.

name: Shrimp Crisps n' Fries
description: (6 pieces) Whole shrimp wrapped in wonton, fried, and served with Cajun fries.

name: Popcorn Shrimp n’ Fries
description: (12 pieces) Fried shrimp, cajun fries, served with cocktail sauce.

name: Cajun Edamame
description: steamed whole soybeans tossed in our house garlic lemon pepper sauce (served mild, medium or spicy).

name: Cajun Fries
description: crispy fries tossed in Cajun seasoning.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
description: fried and served with buttercream.

name: Fried Calamari
description: thinly sliced battered calamari, fried and coated with Cajun seasoning; served with cocktail sauce.

name: Fried Fish Tacos
description: (3 per order) crispy battered white fish served on corn tortillas and topped with pico de gallo.

name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos
description: (3 per order) Cajun marinated grilled shrimp served on corn tortillas and topped with pico de gallo.

name: Shrimp Bites
description: (6 bites) Cajun marinated grilled shrimp served on tortilla scoop chips topped with pico de gallo, sour cream, and sriracha.

name: Coconut Sea Snails
description: Wild caught baby snails, coriander, lemongrass, coconut cream.

name: Garlic Noodles
description: Sautéed in garlic butter.

name: Kickin' Chowder
description: baby clams, potato, white-cream based chowder, served with oyster crackers.

name: KC Gumbo
description: chicken-pork sausages, shrimp, corn, celery, okra, tomato, bell peppers (served with or without rice; mild or spicy).

name: Seafood Scampi
description: scallops, shrimp, clams, and mussels in a creamy garlic white wine sauce; served with pita bread.

name: Seafood Alfredo Pasta
description: Thin fettuccine with scallops, shrimp, clams and mussels in creamy alfredo sauce.

name: KC Tilapia
description: topped with Cajun garlic butter; served with red rice and steamed broccoli.

name: KC Trout
description: topped with Cajun garlic butter; served with red rice and steamed broccoli.
